oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Soldier's certificate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Issued to J. W. [John Wesley] McDonough, 12th Tenn. Vols., USA, by Tennessee Commissioner of Registration. The document states that McDonough was honorably discharged from the army and that he is entitled to vote. Signed by J. N. Puckett. McDonough was in Co. G of the 12th Tenn., a cavalry regiment.
